No matter how far you are, Moms always have our back! Happy Mother’s Day!

That journey we make from maggi to dal makhani? Most of us have our moms to thank for that! And while we may never make food as amazingly as them, we get by with their secret recipes and the million times they repeat it for us. Reminds you of a conversation with your mom? Tag and thank her in the comments!

Do you call your mom before your doctor when you feel sick? We’ve all been there. Though more often than not, she mysteriously knows as soon as she hears our voice. And hearing her voice and listening to her natural home-made remedies gets us back on our feet in no time. Yes? Show her some love in the comments.

From birthdays to anniversaries , of neighbours, relatives to your best friends, that calendar icon on our phones become rather redundant when moms have our back! After all, moms are reminders that never let us down!
